fields.title: Event
fields.description: An event to run after 'event_skip_count' number of entities in the group have spawned

fields.title: Event Skip Count
fields.description: Number of entities spawned in the group to skip before running the event

fields.title: Initial Event
fields.description: Event run for the first 'initial_event_count' number of the group are placed.

fields.title: Initial Event Count
fields.description: Number of times that 'initial_event' can run

fields.title: Max
fields.description: Maximum number of entities in this group to attempt to spawn

fields.title: Min
fields.description: Minimum number of entities in this group to attempt to spawn
